reviews.comments: Heavily water leaking from the roof of bedroom in the evening of checking-in. We tried several times to contact the hosts, sent photos and videos to address this emergency, but none reached us that night. We have to use the container to avoid the water flood over whole bedroom. In the midnight, we finally reached the supporting team of Airbnb, but nothing can be fixed in the midnight, but promises to refund us. How can we find new place immediately in the midnight for foreign nationals? It‚Äôs really a nightmare for vacation of two families.

localizedReview.response:
Ol√°, Guanghai, agradecemos por compartilhar sua experi√™ncia. Pedimos desculpas pelo inconveniente causado pelo vazamento inesperado de √°gua na noite do seu check-in. Entendemos completamente o qu√£o estressante e frustrante essa situa√ß√£o deve ter sido, especialmente ao viajar com a fam√≠lia e chegar tarde da noite.
O apartamento foi totalmente inspecionado e preparado antes da sua chegada, e infelizmente o vazamento ocorreu de repente e fora do nosso controle. Lamentamos que o problema n√£o tenha sido resolvido imediatamente devido ao hor√°rio da noite e agradecemos o envolvimento do Airbnb na organiza√ß√£o do reembolso apropriado. Mais uma vez, pedimos sinceras desculpas pela interrup√ß√£o das suas f√©rias e agradecemos a sua compreens√£o.

reviews.response:
Hi Guanghai, thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We are truly sorry for the inconvenience caused by the unexpected water leak on the night of your check-in. We completely understand how stressful and frustrating this situation must have been, especially while traveling with family and arriving late in the evening.
The apartment had been fully inspected and prepared prior to your arrival, and unfortunately the leak occurred suddenly and outside of our control. That said, we absolutely recognize the impact it had on your stay. Late that night, our team was in contact by phone with your son-in-law to provide support and guidance, and we believed this information would be passed along to you. At no point was it our intention to leave you without assistance.
We regret that the issue could not be resolved immediately due to the time of night, and we appreciate Airbnb‚Äôs involvement in arranging the appropriate refund. Once again, we sincerely apologize for the disruption to your vacation and thank you for your understanding.

reviews.comments: Otimo

Creo que el departamento es caro respecto lo que ofrece. Es casi imposible cocinar en el mismo dado que no tiene los elementos basicos. La terraza - motivo por el cual lo alquile - no tiene luz - no funcionaba casi ninguna de ellas - y no tiene una mesa como para comer. Considerando es un triplex, cocinar en la terraza sin luz y bajar dos pisos para comer en la cocina es totalmente no funcional. Asi que no pudimos usarla. Por otro lado le falta mantenimiento, incluso tuvimos goteras del techo y tuvimos que poner un balde para contener el agua.
